.. AmI-Lab documentation master file, created by
   sphinx-quickstart on Tue Jul 19 16:41:20 2016.
   You can adapt this file completely to your liking, but it should at least
   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to AmI-Lab's documentation!
===================================

This site hosts documentation for the Ambient Intelligence Laboratory at University Politehnica of Bucharest. It includes details about hardware and software stack setup and maintenance, as well as usage details and tutorials for the main platform and related subprojects.

The documentation is organized into the following sections:

* :ref:`hardware-setup`
* :ref:`ami-platform`
* :ref:`sub-projects`

.. _hardware-setup:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Hardware Setup

    hardware_setup


.. _ami-platform:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: AmI Platform

    platform_description
    platform_queues
    platform_pdus


.. _sub-projects:

.. toctree::
    :maxdepth: 2
    :caption: Projects

    projects_index
